views.markdown:
Version 1.2:

- Added support for Aniways, GetGems, iTele Web Version, IranGram 1, IranGram 2, iTelehgram Web Version, Karmiegram, Mobogram, MoneyTalk and StartChat.

~ If you are using clients that we aren't supporting at the moment, feel free to contact us with a link to download that client or the BundleID of the app, or just do a Pull Request on the GitHub page of Telexplicit.
